update msg_company_interview set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hint = #{hint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT *,FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createTime FROM msg_company_interview WHERE 1 = 1 AND company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY STATUS ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT count(*) counts FROM msg_company_interview WHERE 1=1 and company_id = #{companyId} and status = #{status}
mapper.update: update msg_company_interview set status = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
